      • retrieveProject

        public boolean retrieveProject(java.lang.String dir)
        Returns if a project stored in a preferences file can be retrieved

        Method first looks for an 'eadconfig' file in dir or in parents of it and, if this is not present, in the preferences file in the program folder.

        Specified by:
        retrieveProject in interface Configurable
        Overrides:
        retrieveProject in class ProjectConfig
        Parameters:
        dir - the directory that may equal or may be in the project's root directory
        Returns:
        if a saved project could be retrieved
